data.name: Beauties Academy - Spellcraft Tournament
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1808040/On_my_own_A_Hot_Isekai_Adventure/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1872580/Ghostly_Moans/


About the Game

The centenary Spellcraft Tournament is about to start and Rosalee is getting ready to win it. Face enemies, Make friends, Learn powerful skills and win a huge prize! Enjoy a classic JRPG with beautiful girls who need to learn how to control their skills studying at one of the most renowned universities of the kingdom.

Features


  • Day and Night System;
  • Deep Skill Tree System;
  • Unique Characters;
  • Immersive Fantasy World;
  • More than 8 hours of gameplay;
